question.title: Print Diagonal
question.content:
Given a 2D matrix, print all elements of the given matrix in diagonal order.

See the sample input.

Input format :
Line 1 : Number of rows R and cols C in the matrix
Line 2 : RXC elements of the matrix separated by space
Output Format :
 Print the diagonals
Constraints :
 1 <= R <= 10^3
 1 <= C <= 10^3
Sample Input :
3 4
8 3 0 7 
0 3 1 8 
3 9 8 7
Sample Output :
8 
0 3 
3 3 0 
9 1 7 
8 8 
7

rephrased.body: Given a 2D matrix represented as a 2D integer array `arr` of size `row x col`, print all elements of the matrix in diagonal order. The diagonal order is defined as printing elements such that the sum of their row and column indices remains constant for each diagonal. Print each diagonal on a new line.
